an4.99:4.3: Attahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya, parahitāya paṭipanno no attahitāya, nevattahitāya paṭipanno no parahitāya, attahitāya ceva paṭipanno parahitāya ca.
an4.99:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya?
an4.99:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attanā pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, no paraṃ pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:5.3: attanā adinnādānā paṭivirato hoti, no paraṃ adinnādānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:5.4: attanā kāmesumicchācārā paṭivirato hoti, no paraṃ kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:5.5: attanā musāvādā paṭivirato hoti, no paraṃ musāvādā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:5.6: attanā surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti, no paraṃ surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti.
an4.99:5.7: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya.
an4.99:6.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāya?
an4.99:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attanā pāṇātipātā appaṭivirato hoti, paraṃ pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:6.3: attanā adinnādānā appaṭivirato hoti, paraṃ adinnādānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:6.4: attanā kāmesumicchācārā appaṭivirato hoti, paraṃ kāmesumicchācārā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:6.5: attanā musāvādā appaṭivirato hoti, paraṃ musāvādā veramaṇiyā samādapeti;
an4.99:6.6: attanā surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā appaṭivirato hoti, paraṃ surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti.
an4.99:6.7: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāya.
an4.99:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitāya paṭipanno hoti no parahitāya?
an4.99:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attanā pāṇātipātā appaṭivirato hoti, no paraṃ pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā samādapeti … pe … attanā surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā appaṭivirato hoti, no paraṃ surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti.
an4.99:7.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo nevattahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no parahitāya.
an4.99:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya ceva paṭipanno hoti parahitāya ca?
an4.99:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo attanā ca pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti, parañca pāṇātipātā veramaṇiyā samādapeti … pe … attanā ca surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭivirato hoti, parañca surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā veramaṇiyā samādapeti.
an4.99:8.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo attahitāya ceva paṭipanno hoti parahitāya ca.
an4.99:8.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
